sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function ProductDetail( { item } ) { const { image, quantity, ...newItem} = item; const { id, name, price, shortDescription, description } = newItem; const modalSettings = { title: name, className: "modal-lg" } return (
ID { id }
Name { name }
Price { price }
About { shortDescription }
Detail { description }
) } export default ProductDetail;
